name: Karpe & Dem's
description:
A game based on jumping fishes & timing.

Tap on the left to make Karpe jump

Tap on the right to make Dem's jump

Tilt your phone to make them move !

This game was made for school, it's not as polished as we would want but still we're quite proud of what we were able to do !

Credits:

Maxime Congy - Environnement, Chara design, UI & 3D

Antoine Destailleurs - Chara design, 3D, Animation, Fx & Illustrations

Hadrien Auvray - Game design, Level design, Sound design, Music

Alexis Jouanneau - Game design, Programming, Sound design
